document.full_text: hamas security troops stormed a building in central gaza on tuesday forcing a standoff with the extremists who killed vittorio arrigoni, according to the gazan interior ministry.
document.title: hamas captures suspect in italian's killing; 2 others dead
lines_and_colors: hamas security troops stormed a building in central gaza on tuesday forcing a standoff with the extremists who killed vittorio arrigoni, according to the gazan interior ministry.
